name: Settlers & Prophecies
description:
The game was created with Godot engine 3.4.4 stable. It’s our entry for LDJam 50. This has been a really fun event, and this time, we have a game with some... gameplay!

This has been quite an hard project for us, working from the beginning to the end with little breaks. But we're quite happy with what we've manage to create. The theme (delay the inevitable) is not predominant in our game but it's there.

We hope you'll enjoy this peaceful city builder!

Known issues: On some browsers, you may experience some slight sound latency and stuttering.

Tools:

  • Godot Engine
  • Gimp
  • Mypaint
  • A bunch of synths and effects

Fonts:

  • FT88 by Ange Degheest
  • Alegreya Sans by Huerta Tipográfica

We hope you'll enjoy our game, and tell us if you find some nasty bugs!

Disclaimer: we've made a minor change in the game, to squash a nasty little bug that would sometimes trigger an ending where there should be none. You can still download the original LDjam version below (with the bug included!) .
